verses.verse: <S%H5162>Comfort<s%> ye, <S%H5162>comfort<s%> ye my <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> ye <S%H3820>comfortably<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto her, that her <S%H6635>warfare<s%> is <S%H4390>accomplished<s%>, that her <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> is <S%H7521>pardoned<s%>: for she hath <S%H3947>received<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3718>double<s%> for all her <S%H2403>sins<s%>.

¶ The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of him that <S%H7121>crieth<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, <S%H6437>Prepare<s%> ye the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, make <S%H3474>straight<s%> in the <S%H6160>desert<s%> a <S%H4546>highway<s%> for our <S%H430>God<s%>.

Every <S%H1516>valley<s%> shall be <S%H5375>exalted<s%>, and every <S%H2022>mountain<s%> and <S%H1389>hill<s%> shall be made <S%H8213>low<s%>: and the <S%H6121>crooked<s%> shall be made <S%H4334>straight<s%>, and the rough <S%H7406>places<s%> <S%H1237>plain<s%>:

And the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H1540>revealed<s%>, and all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it <S%H3162>together<s%>: for the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7121>Cry<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, What shall I <S%H7121>cry<s%>? All <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H2682>grass<s%>, and all the <S%H2617>goodliness<s%> thereof is as the <S%H6731>flower<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>:

The <S%H2682>grass<s%> <S%H3001>withereth<s%>, the <S%H6731>flower<s%> <S%H5034>fadeth<s%>: because the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5380>bloweth<s%> upon it: <S%H403>surely<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> is <S%H2682>grass<s%>.
The <S%H2682>grass<s%> <S%H3001>withereth<s%>, the <S%H6731>flower<s%> <S%H5034>fadeth<s%>: but the <S%H1697>word<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

¶ O <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, that bringest good <S%H1319>tidings<s%>, get thee <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>; O <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, that bringest good <S%H1319>tidings<s%>, lift <S%H7311>up<s%> thy <S%H6963>voice<s%> with <S%H3581>strength<s%>; lift it <S%H7311>up<s%>, be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%>; <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, Behold your <S%H430>God<s%>!

Behold, the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> with <S%H2389>strong<s%> hand, and his <S%H2220>arm<s%> shall <S%H4910>rule<s%> for him: behold, his <S%H7939>reward<s%> is with him, and his <S%H6468>work<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

He shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> his <S%H5739>flock<s%> like a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>: he shall <S%H6908>gather<s%> the <S%H2922>lambs<s%> with his <S%H2220>arm<s%>, and <S%H5375>carry<s%> them in his <S%H2436>bosom<s%>, and shall gently <S%H5095>lead<s%> those that are with <S%H5763>young<s%>.

¶ Who hath <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the hollow of his <S%H8168>hand<s%>, and meted <S%H8505>out<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> with the <S%H2239>span<s%>, and <S%H3557>comprehended<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> in a <S%H7991>measure<s%>, and <S%H8254>weighed<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> in <S%H6425>scales<s%>, and the <S%H1389>hills<s%> in a <S%H3976>balance<s%>?
Who hath <S%H8505>directed<s%> the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, or being his <S%H376%H6098>counseller<s%> hath <S%H3045>taught<s%> him?

With whom took he <S%H3289>counsel<s%>, and who <S%H995>instructed<s%> him, and <S%H3925>taught<s%> him in the <S%H734>path<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, and <S%H3925>taught<s%> him <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, and <S%H3045>shewed<s%> to him the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding<s%>?

Behold, the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are as a <S%H4752>drop<s%> of a <S%H1805>bucket<s%>, and are <S%H2803>counted<s%> as the small <S%H7834>dust<s%> of the <S%H3976>balance<s%>: behold, he taketh <S%H5190>up<s%> the <S%H339>isles<s%> as a very little <S%H1851>thing<s%>.
And <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> is <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H1767>sufficient<s%> to <S%H1197>burn<s%>, nor the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> thereof <S%H1767>sufficient<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>.
All <S%H1471>nations<s%> before him are as nothing; and they are <S%H2803>counted<s%> to him less than <S%H657>nothing<s%>, and <S%H8414>vanity<s%>.
¶ To whom then will ye <S%H1819>liken<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>? or what <S%H1823>likeness<s%> will ye <S%H6186>compare<s%> unto him?

The <S%H2796>workman<s%> <S%H5258>melteth<s%> a graven <S%H6459>image<s%>, and the <S%H6884>goldsmith<s%> <S%H7554>spreadeth<s%> it over with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H6884>casteth<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H7577>chains<s%>.

He that is so <S%H5533%H5534>impoverished<s%> that he hath no <S%H8641>oblation<s%> <S%H977>chooseth<s%> a <S%H6086>tree<s%> that will not <S%H7537>rot<s%>; he <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> unto him a <S%H2450>cunning<s%> <S%H2796>workman<s%> to <S%H3559>prepare<s%> a graven <S%H6459>image<s%>, that shall not be <S%H4131>moved<s%>.

Have ye not <S%H3045>known<s%>? have ye not <S%H8085>heard<s%>? hath it not been <S%H5046>told<s%> you from the <S%H7218>beginning<s%>? have ye not <S%H995>understood<s%> from the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>?

It is he that <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> upon the <S%H2329>circle<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof are as <S%H2284>grasshoppers<s%>; that stretcheth <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> as a <S%H1852>curtain<s%>, and spreadeth them <S%H4969>out<s%> as a <S%H168>tent<s%> to dwell <S%H3427>in<s%>:
That <S%H5414>bringeth<s%> the <S%H7336>princes<s%> to nothing; he <S%H6213>maketh<s%> the <S%H8199>judges<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> as <S%H8414>vanity<s%>.

Yea, they shall not be <S%H5193>planted<s%>; yea, they shall not be <S%H2232>sown<s%>: yea, their <S%H1503>stock<s%> shall not take <S%H8327>root<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and he shall also <S%H5398>blow<s%> upon them, and they shall <S%H3001>wither<s%>, and the <S%H5591>whirlwind<s%> shall <S%H5375>take<s%> them away as <S%H7179>stubble<s%>.
To whom then will ye <S%H1819>liken<s%> me, or shall I be <S%H7737>equal<s%>? <S%H559>saith<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%>.

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> who hath <S%H1254>created<s%> these things, that bringeth <S%H3318>out<s%> their <S%H6635>host<s%> by <S%H4557>number<s%>: he <S%H7121>calleth<s%> them all by <S%H8034>names<s%> by the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of his <S%H202>might<s%>, for that he is <S%H533>strong<s%> in <S%H3581>power<s%>; not <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5737>faileth<s%>.

Why <S%H559>sayest<s%> thou, O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H1696>speakest<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, My <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H5641>hid<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and my <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is passed <S%H5674>over<s%> from my <S%H430>God<s%>?

¶ Hast thou not <S%H3045>known<s%>? hast thou not <S%H8085>heard<s%>, that the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H1254>Creator<s%> of the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, <S%H3286>fainteth<s%> not, neither is <S%H3021>weary<s%>? there is no <S%H2714>searching<s%> of his <S%H8394>understanding<s%>.
He <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> to the <S%H3287>faint<s%>; and to them that have no <S%H202>might<s%> he <S%H7235>increaseth<s%> <S%H6109>strength<s%>.

But they that <S%H6960>wait<s%> upon the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H2498>renew<s%> their <S%H3581>strength<s%>; they shall mount <S%H5927>up<s%> with <S%H83>wings<s%> as <S%H5404>eagles<s%>; they shall <S%H7323>run<s%>, and not be <S%H3021>weary<s%>; and they shall <S%H3212>walk<s%>, and not <S%H3286>faint<s%>.
